intro.title: Expert Accounting & Bookkeeping Services
intro.text: We offer a comprehensive range of accounting, bookkeeping, tax, and advisory services to individuals and businesses in Howick and the KZN Midlands. Our experienced team is dedicated to providing you with expert financial services and guidance.

services.title: Accounting Officer
services.description: Professional accounting services including annual financial statements, compilations, independent reviews, and audits.
details: Audits (in association with Baker Tilly JHB Inc.)

services.title: Bookkeeping Services
services.description: Comprehensive monthly accounting and bookkeeping functions to keep your finances organized and up-to-date.

services.title: Income Tax
services.description: Expert tax services for companies, trusts, individuals, and sole proprietors. We ensure compliance and optimize your tax position.
details: Income tax returns for companies, trusts, and individuals

services.title: Statutory Returns
services.description: Complete management of all statutory returns and compliance requirements for your business.

services.title: Statutory Registrations
services.description: Assist with all necessary statutory registrations to ensure your business is compliant from the start.
details: Department of Labour for UIF and WCA

services.title: Payroll
services.description: Comprehensive payroll management including weekly, bi-weekly, and monthly processing with detailed reporting.
details: Payroll Reports - Total earnings, deductions & contributions

services.title: Secretarial Services
services.description: Complete secretarial services for companies including CIPC returns, registrations, and ongoing compliance.

services.title: Consulting & Advisory
services.description: Strategic business consulting including internal audits, budgeting, cash flow management, and business planning.

callToAction.title: Need Accounting or Bookkeeping Assistance?
callToAction.text: Contact us today to discuss your accounting, bookkeeping, or advisory needs and discover how we can help your business succeed.
